schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.description: The whole event will change as we go, but we present you with an approximate schedule of the wedding and reception. The most important thing is that we all have a good time, so spend this time at your own pace üòä

rsvp.description1: Please confirm your attendance at the wedding along with information about whether you are bringing your children and whether you would like to use accommodation.
rsvp.description2: We can't wait to spend this special day with you!

quiz.description: We invite you to take part in the Quiz with prizes for the first three people with the best results! It's going to be available on 7th of July and is going to be available until 11th of July 23:59

bingo.title: Bingo  üëÄ
bingo.description: We invite you to take part in Bingo with prizes for the first two drawn people who mark one vertical, slant or horizontal Bingo!
bingo.footer: Bingo cards are on the table next to the tinctures and guest book.

guestBook.title: Guest Book üìñ and message in a bottle üçæ
guestBook.description:
We invite you to leave us an entry in the guest book. We encourage you to take photos, use stickers and all available accessories.

Additionally there's gonna be a bottle where you can put your message that will be read by the bride and groom on their first wedding anniversary.
guestBook.footer: The Guest Book is next to the tinctures and Bingo Cards.
